task.title: Creating Subscriptions / Memberships
task.abstract: Memberships are time related items managed in a term, calendar, or lifetime Subscription Plan that is available for purchase on the eStore.

step.cmd: Create a Subscription Plan, and Items with the attributes Is Subscription, Enable Assignments, and, optionally, Require Assignments.
Create a Catalog then add the subscription items.
Assign the Subscription Plan to the Item.

ul.li: Add the Catalog to a Store.
